column4: i have ubuntu with hdmi but I can't seem to get any sound out of it via hdmi
alsamixer sees the IEC958 stuff but it's volume is set to zero (I unmuted it) but I cannot get the sound to change from 0
i'm not sure you get sound out of hdmi , I think it's just high quality and it allows feedback from th otehr device,  like the tv remote , if you can handle it
